Do I Have to Show My Face on OnlyFans? Truth Revealed!

Estimated Reading Time: 3 min 12 sec

No. You can create OnlyFans content without showing your face. You only need to show your actual face during the profile verification process. OnlyFans does not share your verification details with subscribers. Therefore, you can show or hide your face on OnlyFans and make money, but the latter requires a thought-out approach.

Showing your face on OnlyFans as a content creator proves your authenticity, boosting your subscribers’ trust. If you produce valuable, useful, and engaging content while showing your face on OnlyFans, you will likely generate income easily. However, hiding your face may make it harder for you to generate income. 

Many of the handsome men and beautiful models on OnlyFans display their faces and well-built bodies on their profiles and cover photos to hook their potential subscribers. Thus, creating stiff competition for creators selling without showing their real faces. 

If your OnlyFans profile and cover photo show your actual face and you decide to produce content while hiding your face, you will have a relatively easier time selling because people know you. Wearing a mask to hide your face at this point might serve the purpose of fulfilling your subscriber’s desires or wanting to create curiosity. 

What if you want to stay anonymous? Can you make money on OnlyFans if your profile and cover photo are fictitious and you post faceless content? Going down this route makes the money-making process tougher. If you want to sell faceless pictures and videos on OnlyFans and remain anonymous, but make consistent income, stick around because this article got you. 

Make an appointment now

Why You May Consider Hiding Your Face and Staying Anonymous on OnlyFans

OnlyFans has a poor reputation because it hosts a massive amount of adult content. Whenever you inform a friend or family member that you are an OnlyFans content creator, they hurriedly conclude that you are creating adult content before getting the correct response. Other than the known poor reputation and some people not giving you time to explain yourself, here are critical reasons that may make you consider hiding your face and staying anonymous:

1. To Pique People’s Curiosity 

Did you know that there are famous and successful anonymous musicians? For example, Sia and Mashmellow rarely show their faces, yet they have an immense following and generate so much income. Why is that?

Well, such musicians produce great music that hooks their audience. Their audience keeps coming back for more because they are curious, and all the time, they wonder who is behind the beautiful voices and outstanding compositions. You can replicate the same by starting a faceless and anonymous OnlyFans.

You do not have to be a musician to pull off this trick; you only need to start as an anonymous creator. Considering the example, despite some articles or videos that have provided evidence of the real faces of the musicians, so many people are still skeptical as to whether the faces are real. The guessing game allows musicians to make more money and attract large audiences. 

To have the same effect, despite making adult or non-adult content, you must ensure that you start your OnlyFans anonymously and produce quality content. Engaging, useful, and valuable content is addictive. Once you have a strategy that fulfills this, you can produce faceless content, stay anonymous, keep your audience guessing, and still make money on OnlyFans. 

2. To Reserve Your Job Position 

Many companies allow employees to take extra jobs to supplement their financial needs. But, you might end up working for a company whose contract specifies that you cannot take up an extra job while working for them, forcing you to keep your OnlyFans anonymous.

Despite the contract not stating that you should not own OnlyFans, you are better off keeping it anonymous to avoid losing your job position. Making a steady income from OnlyFans takes time and effort, so you should ensure that no other employee knows you are on OnlyFans. 

If you create adult content, you do not want your fellow employees to see your nudes on the internet. This might affect your mental health and ruin your reputation. For example, imagine being a lecturer and discovering that your students have access to your nudes and share them. You would find teaching hard, and the University might fire you. 

Furthermore, some corporations do not want anything to do with an OnlyFans creator, mostly those selling adult content. So, if you are working with such a corporation, you must stay anonymous on OnlyFans and never show your face. 

3. To Avoid Friends and Family Ridicule 

Many families are generally against their children creating and selling adult content. If you know you cannot handle the possibility of your friends and family finding your adult content, do not show your face and stay completely anonymous on OnlyFans. 

For example, imagine your dad landing on your adult content while surfing through OnlyFans. As a lady, what would you do? Avoid such embarrassing events by not showing your face on OnlyFans, especially if you are from a prestigious family. 

4. To Deal with Embarrassment and Shyness 

Countless men and women still face the stigma of different body shapes and features, making them shy and embarrassed to show off their bodies. If you are one of them and want to create OnlyFans, start by creating content without showing your face to gauge your subscriber’s reactions and responses. This works best if you are selling revealing content and you do not have confidence in your body outlook. 

Society considers some topics embarrassing, such as sexual fantasies and homosexuality. If you are not confident enough to discuss such topics but feel a burning fire to share your thoughts, consider having an anonymous OnlyFans. You can discuss the topics with less anxiety, fear, and doubt. 

Whether you create adult or non-adult content and are camera-shy, get some masks to help with your shyness. Being camera shy should not stop you from putting your content out there and raking in those OnlyFans dollars. 

The Pros of Hiding Your Face on OnlyFans 

  • You enhance your privacy 

Hiding your face and staying anonymous allows you to protect your personal details. You can freely interact and walk among people without fear because no one knows you create content on OnlyFans. You do not have to deal with people drooling over you in case your OnlyFans content makes you Famous.

  • You can have a more loyal and engaged audience 

You are likely to have a small group of subscribers and grow at a slower pace once you start producing content anonymously. The few people you attract usually remain loyal for a long period earning you income consistently. This is an advantage because you do not feel pressured to show your face to either keep making money or garner more subscribers. 

  • You protect your identity in case of a data leak 

OnlyFans, like any other social media platform, is vulnerable to hacks and data breaches. In 2020, terabytes of private photos and videos of OnlyFans’ creators were leaked. Despite OnlyFans denying the hack claims, the exclusive videos and photos were available for anyone to view. 

Being anonymous allows you to keep creating your content without the fear of a leak revealing your exclusive content in case you were producing adult content. In case a data breach occurs, you can keep creating content and recovering quicker than the creators whose profiles were public. 

  • You can make money due to curiosity 

If you were to gather a huge following of subscribers due to them wanting to disclose your identity because of the effect your content has on them, you could make so much money by keeping your audience guessing. You can even do teasers and create challenges where your subscribers pay to participate. Most of the challenge would involve them guessing your identity. 

You can change characters in case you fall sick and have a doppelganger. Your content creation strategy can run for a long time because no one knows who is behind the actual character nor the owner of the content. 

The Cons of Hiding Your Face on OnlyFans 

  • Promoting and getting subscribers becomes difficult 

Growing an anonymous OnlyFans following from scratch can prove challenging, especially when you do not know the ins and outs of digital marketing. You will have difficulty convincing them that your content is valuable. 

Finding a good agency helps reduce the time taken to get subscribers on OnlyFans, increase sales, and more. Fandafia is here to help you along your journey. Book your appointment to kick start your faceless OnlyFans journey with success. 

  • It becomes harder to compete 

More than 1.5 million OnlyFans content creators are fighting for the attention of various users on the platform. Most creators are not afraid to show their faces and have a solid establishment. As a faceless creator, going against such creators becomes harder because no one knows you, and you are hiding your face, so why should anyone bother subscribing to a ghost’s content?

You will likely give up after some time because your content receives little to no attention. Consistency is the secret to gaining the upper hand in such a competitive environment. Getting the backup of Fandafia would strengthen your hopes of eventually becoming a successful faceless OnlyFans content seller.

How to Make Money Without Showing Your Face on OnlyFans

To make money without showing your face, you must promote your content, but how would you do that when you are not showing your face? You also must take specific measures to ensure your identity remains anonymous. Here are five tips to ensure you remain anonymous on OnlyFans but still earn money:

1. Create a New OnlyFans Creator’s Account 

First, select a niche when creating a new OnlyFans creator’s account. You cannot randomly select a niche and expect to sell. Do a market study to determine what niches in the faceless content creation space sell more. For example, niches such as foot pics and boobs photos and videos are great niches if you are into adult content. Keeping fit as a niche sells better if you have a great body and do not want to show your face. 

Selecting a niche will give you an easier time down the line when strategizing on content production. When promoting your content, you will have peace of mind when suiting the niche for other social media platforms. 

Once you have your niche in mind, create two OnlyFans creator accounts using fake emails. You will use one account to promote your faceless content and another to sell your exclusive content. Avoid signing up to OnlyFans using your social media details, use fake emails. 

Use a fake username; do not use your real profile and cover photos. Based on your niche, you can use photos depicting your content to lure in subscribers. For example, if you sell foot pics, include your beautiful pictures within the profile and cover photos. 

Ensure your profile does not contain any details that might compromise your identity. For example, ensure your bio does not reveal any information your subscribers can piece together to determine your identity. 

If any of your parents have access to your banking details and cards, ensure you change them or get new ones because OnlyFans billing details indicate the sender. That way, you, and the bank only, will know that OnlyFans does send in payments during a specific period. Once you have untraceable banking details, use them to verify your OnlyFans creators account. Ensure the selfie, the driving license, or any other personal details you provide during the verification process match your identity, or you risk failing the verification process.

OnlyFans supports anonymous creators and does not share any verification details you provide with your subscribers. Keep in mind that OnlyFans only pays verified creators, and you must provide your actual details for them to ascertain that you are of age to be an OnlyFans creator. 

Once OnlyFans verifies your account, select a stage name to use during production. A stage name hides your identity. Make sure the name relates to the content you produce to sustain marketing. 

2. Create New Anonymous Social Media Accounts 

Using social media accounts with your actual identity to promote your anonymous OnlyFans is a bad idea. That is why you must create new social media accounts. Ensure to set up similar bios as the one on your OnlyFans. Having a universal profile throughout your socials gives your subscribers an easier time finding your content. 

Furthermore, setting up anonymous social media profiles ensures no one can trace you once you include links to those social media platforms within your OnlyFans profile. 

OnlyFans also requires that you link specific social media platforms for verification. Therefore, uniformity would hasten and simplify the verification process. 

Do not allow either of your social media accounts to have access to nor synchronize with your contact list. This also applies to OnlyFans. Doing this ensures that none of the applications reveals your identity to your contacts by recommending them to your social media content. For example, Facebook recommends friends once it has gone through your contact list and synchronized them. 

3. Implement OnlyFans Privacy Settings 

OnlyFans provides you with various privacy settings that can boost your anonymity. Implement the settings to ensure that no one ever gets access to your details that OnlyFans stores. 

Start by creating a stronger password that includes text, numbers, and other characters. Long passwords are harder to crack. Use a password strength checker tool to test the possibility of someone cracking your password. 

Set up two-factor authentication to enhance the protection of your profile. OnlyFans’ two-factor authentication feature requires that you link your Google account, Microsoft account, or mobile number with your OnlyFans profile. Create a fake Google or Microsoft account, and avoid using your mobile number. 

If you use a mobile number, buy a new disposable Subscriber Information Module (SIM) card, register it and use it. Do not use the new SIM card for any other purpose, and do not save any contacts on the SIM. Only use the SIM card when required by OnlyFans to complete the two-factor authentication process.

Check your OnlyFans privacy settings and turn off the display active status toggle, hide the sum of tips, change your friend’s list setting to confidential, and hide the media counts. 

4. Hide Your Actual Location 

OnlyFans provides a geo-blocking feature to control who can view your content. The feature is within your settings page, under the security section. Use the geo-blocking feature to block subscribers in your location from accessing your content. You can also do that if you want to block specific Internet Protocols (IPs). 

You risk losing out on many subscribers from within your area, though your privacy solidifies and the chances of your family members or friends landing on your content diminish. Despite you blocking out specific people, remember that they can access your content using a Virtual Private Network (VPN) connection. Though, the chances of this happening are negligible. 

5. Use Masks, Costumes, Varied Camera Angles, and Voice Changers

When creating content, use masks and wigs to hide your facial features. Use a mask that covers your face completely and ensure it fits correctly to reduce the chances of it falling off. A wig would help hide your hairstyle. If you have scars and tattoos that may reveal your identity, acquire costumes to hide them.

If you have a distinct voice, hide it using voice changers. Voice changers are mostly handy when you are an OnlyFans creator who discusses controversial topics such as those involving precise scientific findings and government secrets. 

When shooting videos, ensure the camera angles do not reveal any other detail within your surroundings that may give your subscribers an idea of your identity. For example, change the background if you are shooting videos while in a room at home and ensure that you do not post videos of your neighborhood. 

Promoting Your Faceless Content on OnlyFans- 8 Tips and Tricks

The only way you can make sales is by promoting your faceless content. The audience you want to reach must know your content exists and that your faceless content is worth buying. 

Promoting your content becomes harder because you cannot use your initial social media platforms to promote your faceless OnlyFans account. The aim is to stay anonymous, and using previous social media accounts to sell your content would blow your cover. 

When starting, you are starting from nothing, with no friends or family to push your content or give you the first views. Considering the skepticism that OnlyFans creators receive, you must do a lot of convincing. Use these tactics to promote your faceless OnlyFans and make sales:

1. Create Two Anonymous OnlyFans Pages 

In the beginning, create two anonymous OnlyFans pages, one with free content and the other with exclusive content. It does not matter what niche you are creating faceless content for, having two OnlyFans accounts allows you to monitor sales and your audiences’ responses to your marketing. 

Post free content consistently on the first OnlyFans page. Ensure that you keep your audience engaged and that your content serves their needs. Kindly focus on your audience’s feedback, and make changes where reasonable. They are your guide at the starting point because you are competing against other creators, and your audience must have decided to interact with your content for a specific reason. 

2. Always Have Fun

Remember to always have fun. Generally, promoting a faceless and anonymous OnlyFans involves a lot of trial and error. So, let the wave guide you. Create fun challenges and accomplish them with your audience. Creativity can save you because once you get your first paying clients, more will come through autonomously. 

3. Repurpose Content 

For every free faceless content you create, repurpose it and post it on the anonymous social media accounts you have created. Repurposing saves you time and energy because you only need to produce original content for OnlyFans, and optimize the video or photo to fit into the other social media accounts such as Instagram. 

In case a post gets several reactions on free mode, create a sales funnel that drives traffic to your premium OnlyFans page, inviting those who would love to see another post as such. You are likely to get more subscribers if you let them willingly decide to consume your premium content. 

4. Follow the Guidelines and Use Other Social Media Platforms 

When promoting content on other social media platforms, like TikTok, ensure that you understand their rules and regulations. Platforms such as TikTok do not allow adult content, and posting sexually suggestive content will lead to TikTok banning your account. 

If you create adult content, you can promote it on other TikTok alternatives, such as SikSok, that host adult content. You can post your free content over there and specify that you own OnlyFans to drive traffic to your OnlyFans. 

Platforms like Reddit host communities where you can promote your content and ask questions about creating a successful faceless OnlyFans. 

5. Use a Proper Gifting Strategy 

If you promote your content by gifting your subscribers, ensure you keep your real details private when shipping the gifts. Request the subscribers you are gifting to send you their address details and ship the gifts as an anonymous sender. 

Receiving gifts from an anonymous sender is intriguing and can pique a subscriber’s interest. Therefore, for every subscriber, you successfully gift, request them to create testimonial videos to help promote your content. Repurpose the testimonials and post them within your anonymous social media accounts and OnlyFans page. 

Testimonials boost subscribers’ trust in you, which may lead to them sending tips to support your work or promoting your content for free. 

6. Sell Mainly Through Subscriptions 

OnlyFans allows you to sell through various methods, such as paid subscriptions, paid-per-view messages, stream gates, and more. Paid subscriptions are the best-earning method when you own an anonymous OnlyFans.

For starters, price your faceless exclusive content fairly. Overcharging your subscribers might discourage them from subscribing continuously. Create content consistently for your free-tier OnlyFans page and encourage your audience to subscribe to your premium OnlyFans page. 

To enhance the chances of your audience subscribing, use the inbuilt OnlyFans promotional tools such as the referral program. You can gift a free subscription package to every subscriber who refers you to another paying subscriber. 

Later, utilize the other earning methods provided by OnlyFans, such as stream gates. Stream gates earn you money for every subscriber who pays to access your live streams. For every live stream you conduct, you can earn extra income through tips.

After gaining a substantial following, you can start selling exclusive or requested content to specific subscribers through the pay-per-view messaging feature. Pay-per-view messages earn you income when you send out messages, and your subscribers pay to view the message’s contents. 

7. Network and Collaborate with Influencers 

Despite being anonymous and not showing your face on OnlyFans, you can still network and know other faceless creators. Use secure messaging applications such as Signal and create an anonymous profile to communicate and network. Established faceless OnlyFans content creators can give you insights on how to grow faster and get more sales. 

Established influencers can also help you put your content in front of an audience that might potentially pay for your content. If you do not have the budget to invest in an influencer, you can call them and ask them to collaborate with you. You can offer to promote the influencer’s content on your OnlyFans in exchange for their services. 

8. Keep Going and Do not Stop

Producing faceless content might prove tough to sell, but once you get a strategy that works, you will make money on a long-term basis. You must keep trying and developing several new strategies that allow you not to show your face but still make money on OnlyFans.

If you feel overwhelmed, seek the services of professionals at Fandafia, they know how the OnlyFans selling system works and are always ready to help. Please book an appointment with them and see your faceless content-selling business grow. 

When Should You Own a Website as an OnlyFans Creator?

There is no specific answer to this question. Whether you are a beginner or an expert OnlyFans creator, here are some starting points that might apply to you:

1. When You Know how the Content Selling Business Model Works 

It would help if you studied the ins and outs of how the content-selling business model works. For example, you must know how to price content, which type of content people love paying for, why people spend on content, the skills your development team should possess, and more. 

Without the business model and psychology in mind, you might fail terribly or lose so much money trying to figure out what to do. Rather than researching everything on your own, you can request the services of an OnlyFans agency. Fandafia is an outstanding OnlyFans agency that offers full-time consultation to help you succeed as an OnlyFans creator. Book an appointment with them and get your problems solved. 

2. When You Have the Funds 

Besides having the business model in mind, you must have enough funds to set up your website. You are better off starting on a serious note if you are to attain your dream of riches by selling your content. Creating a website requires you to own a domain, buy hosting space from a hosting provider, and get a team to help you develop the website. If you are tech-savvy, you can create the website, but it will take so much time, so you should be ready to spend money on this venture. 

You can start by investing in a domain name to prevent another person from using your preferred business name. A domain name is the name of your website, and you buy it from a website hosting services provider. Domain names are pretty cheap, and you can make a one-time payment to reserve the domain name for a whole year as you plan to build your site. 

If you are a beginner OnlyFans creator and have the funds to set up a website, ensure that you consult an agency before spending your money on a website. If you are an expert OnlyFans creator with some knowledge of how the business works and have the funds, invest in securing your domain name first and then proceed to look for a team to help you develop a website. 

When developing your website, it is crucial that you seek guidance in case you get stuck because you stand to lose so much money if you do not. The website development approach you take also determines how much you will spend. The two standard methods include:

    • Building your website from scratch 
    • Using no-code tools or low-code tools to create the website 

  • Building your website from scratch 

Going down this route is expensive and requires much time. You must have coding knowledge, a clear understanding of marketing, user experience design, and how to integrate software components. Generally, the studying curve is steep, forcing you to hire a team of designers, business strategists, and website developers to build the website. 

  • Using no-code tools or low-code tools to create the website 

No-code or low-code tools used to create websites provide you with pre-built components that you can use to develop your websites. These tools save you time and energy. No-code tools have a less steep study curve but are less powerful. For example, Scribe provides you with website-building components on a monthly fee basis. Their website components allow you to build a content-selling website on a monthly fee basis, and you do not have to write any code. 

Using a service such as Scribe can take the shortest time to set up your business, though you must consider your aim of owning your own business. Scribe does not allow you to keep the pre-built website nor migrate the website to another server so that you can gain complete control. So, based on the two approaches, how do you ensure that you eventually own your OnlyFans business?

How to Approach Your Website Creation to Eventually Own Your OnlyFans Business

If you are a beginner or an established OnlyFans creator, ensure you have sufficient information on how the content-selling business works. You can commission an agency such as Fandafia to guide you. 

Proceed to invest in a domain name. Brainstorm to determine the brand name to use when setting up your business. Visit a domain name provider’s website to check whether your desired name is available. Once you find a name that is available and it resonates with the content you create, purchase the domain name and reserve it. 

Developing a website from scratch will waste your time and money. Using a no-code tool limits your growth. Therefore, using a low-code or no-code tool that allows you to scale when necessary is the best option. Alternatively, you can purchase an off-the-shelf pre-made website developed precisely for content marketing and selling and hire a team of developers to modify the website to your liking. 

An excellent example of a low code slash off-the-shelf fully fledged OnlyFans website builder is xFans. xFans provides you with a pre-made system specifically for monetizing your content. You pay a one-time fee and can scale and modify the design and code of your website.  

 Getting a pre-made system specified for selling content saves you time and allows you to achieve your dream at an accelerated pace. For further help and consultation on how to pull this off, please book an appointment with the Fandafia agency; they got a team ready to help you. 

Conclusion

You do not need to show your face on OnlyFans to make content. You can stay anonymous and still make money on OnlyFans. Despite it being hard to create a successful faceless OnlyFans, you can endure the starting point and eventually grow by following the guidelines within this article.
